IndividualIdentification.description: Represents our registration of information used as proof of identity by an individual (passport, national identity card, drivers license, social security number, birth certificate)

issuingAuthority.description: Authority which has issued the identifier, such as: social security, town hall

issuingDate.description: Date at which the identifier was issued

identificationType.description: Identification type (passport, national identity card, drivers license, social security number, birth certificate)

validFor.description: The period for which the identification information is valid.
